#id=1
#text=Our back yard was so bare , so we decided to plant a tree to spruce it up .
#id=2
#text=We decided a nice apple tree would look great , and give us fresh fruit when it 's grown .
#id=3
#text=First we went to the nursery and bough an apple tree sapling .
#id=4
#text=Then when we got home , we got to work .
#id=5
#text=We dug a hole in the ground big enough for the sapling to be planted .
#id=6
#text=Once we had the hole ready , in went the sapling .
#id=7
#text=We made sure it was in deep enough and was standing straight up , then we put the dirt back in around the sapling .
#id=8
#text=We carefully patted the dirt down so it would hold the sapling nice and firm .
#id=9
#text=Once we had done that , we took the garden hose and watered our new plant , making sure it had enough water , but not so much that the dirt would get too muddy and the sapling might be loose .
#text=Then we took a step back and looked at what would eventually become our new apple tree .
